page.title: 17SOCIAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: SOCIAL ACTIVITES CAN BE DIVIDED INTO THREE CATAGORIES; 1 THOSE ENJOYED BY CHILDREN 2 THOSE ENJOYED BY PARENTS 3 THOSE ENJOYED BY THE FAMILY {CHILDRENS ACTIVITIES}INCLUDE JOINING CLUBS; CUBS, BROWNIES, GUIDES, SCOUTS, YOUTH CLUBS ETC., AND ALSO SPORTING ORGANISATIONS; BADMINTON, TENNIS, SQUASH, FOOTBALL, DANCING. {PARENTS ACTIVITIES}ARE VERY SIMILAR, LARGELY BEING MEMBERSHIP OF SPORTING AND SOCIAL CLUBS. ACTIVITIES WHICH INVOLVE THE{WHOLE {FAMILY}INCLUDE CARAVANNING CLUBS. THE MAIN SOCIAL ACTIVITY OF THE FAMILY YEAR IS THE ANNUAL HOLIDAY. MANY NOW TRAVEL ABROAD FOR THEIR HOLIDAYS; SPAIN, FRANCE AND MAJORCA BEING AMONG THE MOST POPULAR. OTHERS HOLIDAY MORE LOCALLY ON THE NORFOLK COAST OR IN SOME OTHER PART OF THE COUNTRY.
